div.bibl: Lietuva, Nov. 3, 1911. THE AURORA LECTURE FORUM

body.p: On November 5, 3:00 P.M., in Aurora Hall, 3149 South Halsted Street, the first lecture of the season will be given. Mr. A. Lalis will read an essay entitled, "History of Inventions". Admission is ten cents.
(2) On November 12, R. Pocis will read an essay entitled, "Combustion".
(3) November 19, K. Jurgelionis will lecture on "The Boundaries of Knowledge".
(4) November 26, Mrs. C. Ciurlionis, will lecture on "The Life and Writings of V. Pietaris".
(5) December 3, K. Jurgelionis will speak on "The Mexican Indians and Their Language".
(6) December 10, Dr. S. A. Rutkauskas and K. Jurgelionis will debate "The Woman Problem".
(7) December 17, J. O. Sirvydas will give a lecture on "The Path of Our Youth".
(8) December 31, Dr. J. J. Kaskevice's subject will be "The Nursing of Babies".
